CustomField.description: Checks if an account is SLED (public sector) and returns true if so.
CustomField.formula: OR( Public_Sector__c = true, CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c, "SLED"), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Industry__c, "Local"), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Industry__c, "Federal"), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Industry__c, "State"), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Industry__c, "K-12"), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Industry__c, "2 Year Institution"), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Industry__c, "4 Year Institution"), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Industry__c, "Utility"), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Industry__c, "Transit"), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Industry__c, "Healthcare"), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Industry__c, "Correctional Facility"), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Industry__c, "Police"), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Industry__c, "Other") )
CustomField.label: SLED Account?
